name: Retro City Rampage DX+
overview: Retro City Rampage DX+ adds more visual polish -- including animated cutscenes. It brings more accessibility options. It boasts a much smoother camera. It adds support for ultra-wide monitors and more dynamic aspect ratios. It includes more HUD options and overscan control to ensure the game (and UI) can better fill the screen. It improves vehicle spawning, improves swimming controls... the list goes on!
